title: Behavior of derivative from graph of function

content.question: The graph of y = f(x) on the closed interval [0, 4] is shown above. Which of the following could be the graph y = f'(x)?

choices.label: A bell-shaped curve is plotted on the xy plane.
A sinusoidal curve is plotted on the xy plane.
A line graph plotted on the xy plane, starting from negative y axis rising upward cutting the positive x axis to enter the first quadrant.

A line graph plotted on the xy plane, starting from the origin sloping downward and then rising upward to enter the first quadrant cutting the positive x axis and then slopes downward further entering the fourth quadrant cutting the positive x axis.
A line graph plotted on the xy plane, starting from the origin in the fourth quadrant and then rising upward to the first quadrant. It further slopes downward again entering into the fourth quadrant.

content.answer: A line graph plotted on the xy plane, starting from the origin sloping downward and then rising upward to enter the first quadrant cutting the positive x axis and then slopes downward further entering the fourth quadrant cutting the positive x axis.

topic.text: 5.8: Sketching Graphs of Functions and Their Derivatives

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
